articles.description: Wales miss out on Euro 2024 spot after penalty shoot-out loss against Poland, plus England draw with Belgium and Northern Ireland beat Scotland.
articles.title: Reaction after Wales miss out on Euros and football latest

articles.description: The Euros provide a golden chance for an England's masters of the missed opportunity to win their first major trophy since 1966
articles.title: 'England have golden chance to win Euros - time for excuses is over'

articles.description: Robert Page's future will be a talking point after Wales failed to qualify for Euro 2024 - but he believes he is still the right man for the job.
articles.title: Proud Page looks to future after Euros heartache

articles.description: The joy of the autumn has dwindled and now all Scotland can see are problems. What has gone wrong for Steve Clarke's squad?
articles.title: 'What's happened to thrusting, confident Scotland?'

articles.description: Northern Ireland defender Conor Bradley says he is "buzzing" after he scored the winning goal against Euro 24-bound Scotland at Hampden Park.
articles.title: Bradley 'buzzing' with first NI goal in win over Scots

articles.description: England seal a series victory over New Zealand with a comprehensive 47-run win in the fourth T20 in Wellington.
articles.title: Bouchier leads England to T20 series win over NZ

articles.description: BBC Sport speaks to elite sportswomen about the physical and mental impact of not being able to find women-appropriate equipment and kit.
articles.title: 'Equipment for women is always number two'

articles.description: Harlequins are hopeful Danny Care can play on next season following his retirement from international rugby.
articles.title: 'Freak athlete' Care can play on - Quins boss

articles.description: The Los Angeles Lakers claim a 128-124 victory over the Milwaukee Bucks after double overtime.
articles.title: NBA: Los Angeles Lakers need double overtime to beat Milwaukee Bucks

articles.description: West Ham midfielder Lucas Paqueta scores a late penalty as Brazil draw 3-3 with Spain in a friendly at Real Madrid's Bernabeu.
articles.title: Paqueta's late penalty earns Brazil draw with Spain
